{"id":839146310,"question_id":695,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1667880854,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"976 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/839146310/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"145.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    \n    int[][] dirs = new int[][]{{0,1},{0,-1},{-1,0},{1,0}};\n    \n    public int maxAreaOfIsland(int[][] grid) {\n        int h = grid.length;\n        int w = grid[0].length;\n        \n        int max=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<h; i++){\n            \n            for(int j=0; j<w; j++){\n                \n                if(grid[i][j]==1){\n                    max = Math.max(max , dfs(grid, new int[]{i, j}, h, w));\n                    // System.out.println( \"max=\"+max);    \n                }\n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n    }\n    \n    private int dfs(int[][] grid, int[] p, int h, int w){\n        \n        Queue<int[]> q = new LinkedList<>();\n        q.offer(p);\n        boolean[][] visited = new boolean[h][w];\n        visited[p[0]][p[1]]=true;\n        int area = 0;\n        \n        while(!q.isEmpty()){\n            p = q.poll();\n            \n            // System.out.println( p[0] + \",\" + p[1]);\n            \n            area++;\n            for(int[] d : dirs){\n                int r = p[0]+d[0];\n                int c = p[1]+d[1];\n                if(r>=0 && r<h && c>=0 && c<w && grid[r][c]==1 && visited[r][c]==false){\n                    visited[r][c]=true;\n                    q.offer(new int[]{r,c});\n                } \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return area;\n    }\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
